title: Ship in a storm
description: I made this in my art class with my teacher. I used water colors for the background clouds and waves. I used markers for the ship. I used tape to stick everything together and make it 3D.

title: NyanCat Box
description: I made this box as a project for Valentine's day for my school. I used markers, papers and thermocol. I worked with my mom on this.

title: Cerberus
description: Cerberus is a mythical creature in the Greek and Roman Mythology. My teacher helped me draw some of this and i finished it and colored it.

title: The Book about the Ocean
description: This was a book cover project i did for my art class. I drew the fish and then colored it. My teacher helped me draw the waves

title: Pikachu
description: I love Pokemon. I drew this based on a Pikachu poster in my room. I really enjoyed drawing it
